title: RPM debugedit tool fails on Linux 386 go binaries
body:
One of the final stages of our build process is to rewrite the base build directory path
in binaries, using tip @ 16136 this is failing for our i586 builds:

[   27s] /usr/lib/rpm/debugedit:
/home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/go-1.0.3+hg83b0b94af636-0.i386/usr/bin/go: Unknown
debugging section .debug_gdb_scripts                                                    
                                                                  
[   27s] Failed to write file: invalid section alignment

amd64 binaries are not affected.

OS: openSUSE 12.2 x86_64 cross compiling for i586
Go version: tip @ 16136

Attaching compiled cmd/go from failed build
Attachments: 1. go (6298158 bytes)
